com.quantcomponents.core.calendar
Class FlatCalendar

java.lang.Object
  com.quantcomponents.core.calendar.FlatCalendar
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITradingCalendar
public class FlatCalendar
extends Object
implements ITradingCalendar

Trivial trading calendar, with a continuous trading period every day, weekend included.
